sentences.english: Dunhuang Grottoes is a history showing with image, including abundant subjects.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌石窟壁画艺术包罗万象，是一部形象的历史。

sentences.english: Characteristics and practical significance of The Illustrations of Moxibustion in Dunhuang Caves were studied and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨分析敦煌石窟《灸法图》的特点及现实意义。

sentences.english: The inspiration of the space arrangement came from the Dunhuang Caves .
sentences.chinese: 空间布置的灵感来自敦煌石窟。

sentences.english: To protect the Dunhuang grottoes, one has to start with an understanding of the surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 保护敦煌石窟，必须先从掌握周围自然环境入手。

sentences.english: The study of Dunhuang grottoes are known as Dunhuangology.
sentences.chinese: 对敦煌石窟的研究又叫敦煌学。
